data.title: Distance from Ouzouer
data.meta_description: The distance from Ouzouer-sous-Bellegarde to Ladon is 6 kilometers by road. Road takes approximately 4 minutes.
data.text:
Fuel cost: 0.8 AUD

This fuel cost is calculated as: (Route length 6 km / 100 km) * (Fuel consumption 8 L/100 km) * (Fuel price 1.71 AUD / L)

You can adjust fuel consumption and fuel price here.

Driving time: 4 min

This time is calculated for driving at the maximum permitted speed, taking into account traffic rules restrictions.

4 km with a maximum speed 90 km/h = 2 min

2 km with a maximum speed 50 km/h = 1 min

The calculated driving time does not take into account intermediate stops and traffic jams.

The distance between Ouzouer-sous-Bellegarde and Ladon is 6 km by road.

Precise satellite coordinates of highways were used for this calculation. The start and finish points are the centers of Ouzouer-sous-Bellegarde and Ladon respectively.
